Class Collection

java.lang.Object
Collection
public class Collection
extends java.lang.Object
This is the container class which creates a song library and manages the operations (add, remove, lend, return, print) on the collection. This class uses an array list to store albums in the Collection.
Author:
Bhavya Patel, Samuel Asher Kappala

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Album[] albums  
    private int numAlbums  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Collection()
    A constructor that creates a collection that stores an array list data structure (albums) and the number of albums (numAlbums) in the collection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean add​(Album album)
    A method to add an album to the Collection.
    private int find​(Album album)
    A private method to return the index of a given album in the albums Array List
    private void grow()
    A method to grow the albums array list by a capacity of 4.
    boolean lendingOut​(Album album)
    A method to lend out an album requested.
    void print()
    A method to print out the Collection in an unspecified order
    void printByGenre()
    A method to print the Collection sorted by genres
    void printByReleaseDate()
    A method to print out the Collection that is sorted by release dates (oldest to latest)
    boolean remove​(Album album)
    A method to remove an album from the Collection.
    boolean returnAlbum​(Album album)
    This method to return the album given.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • albums

      private Album[] albums

    • numAlbums

      private int numAlbums

  • Constructor Details

    • Collection

      public Collection()
      A constructor that creates a collection that stores an array list data structure (albums) and the number of albums (numAlbums) in the collection.

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find​(Album album)
      A private method to return the index of a given album in the albums Array List
      Parameters:
      album -
      Returns:
      index of the album in the Collection Array List

    • grow

      private void grow()
      A method to grow the albums array list by a capacity of 4. The array list does not shrink in size.

    • add

      public boolean add​(Album album)
      A method to add an album to the Collection. This method checks if the album already exists in the albums array list. If the album already exists, the new album is not added. if albums array list is full, it calls grow() function to increase the size.
      Parameters:
      takes - an album to be added to the Collection
      Returns:
      true if the album is added, false otherwise

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Album album)
      A method to remove an album from the Collection.
      Parameters:
      album -
      Returns:
      true if the album is removed, false otherwise

    • lendingOut

      public boolean lendingOut​(Album album)
      A method to lend out an album requested. When the album is lent out, this method sets the availability of the album to false.
      Parameters:
      album -
      Returns:
      true if album is lent out, false otherwise

    • returnAlbum

      public boolean returnAlbum​(Album album)
      This method to return the album given. This method sets the availability of the returned album to true( which means the album is available).
      Parameters:
      album -
      Returns:
      true if album is successfully returned, false otherwise

    • print

      public void print()
      A method to print out the Collection in an unspecified order

    • printByReleaseDate

      public void printByReleaseDate()
      A method to print out the Collection that is sorted by release dates (oldest to latest)

    • printByGenre

      public void printByGenre()
      A method to print the Collection sorted by genres
